blogPost.excerpt: Implementing a great email program is the most effective way to grow your business. Discover 60+ growth tactics to increase your email ROI based on the strategic goals you want to achieve, such as: improving deliverability, increasing open rates, and more.
blogPost.body: Implementing a great email program is the most effective way to grow your business. Discover 60+ growth tactics to increase your email ROI based on the strategic goals you want to achieve, such as: improving deliverability, increasing open rates, and more.
blogPost.title: Email Growth Playbook - Increase your email ROI with 60+ growth tactics
blogPost.author: Julie Paci

localize.description: 实施一个优秀的电子邮件计划是发展业务的最有效方式。根据您想要实现的战略目标，发现60多种增长策略，以提高您的电子邮件投资回报率，例如：提高交付能力，提高打开率等。
localize.tagline: 通过60+增长策略提高你的电子邮件投资回报率

localize.description: 實施一個優秀的電子郵件計劃是發展業務的最有效方式。根據您想要實現的戰略目標，發現60多種增長策略，以提高您的電子郵件投資回報率，例如：提高交付能力，提高打開率等。
localize.tagline: 通過60+增長策略提高你的電子郵件投資回報率

previous.excerpt: Collecting binding e-signatures is a hassle. Etch e-sign free simplifies this process to three easy steps: upload a PDF, choose up to two signers, and send a signature request for free. Signers can review and sign documents from anywhere on any device.
previous.title: Etch E-Sign Free - Simple, intuitive and binding e-signatures, absolutely free

localize.description: 收集具有约束力的电子签名是一件很麻烦的事情。Etch e-sign free将这一过程简化为三个简单的步骤：上传一个PDF文件，选择最多两个签名人，并免费发送签名请求。签署人可以在任何设备上随时随地查看和签署文件。
localize.tagline: 简单、直观、有约束力的电子签名，完全免费。

localize.description: 收集具有約束力的電子簽名是一件很麻煩的事情。Etch e-sign free將這一過程簡化爲三個簡單的步驟：上傳一個PDF文件，選擇最多兩個簽名人，並免費發送簽名請求。簽署人可以在任何設備上隨時隨地查看和簽署文件。
localize.tagline: 簡單、直觀、有約束力的電子簽名，完全免費。
